basic.name: Simple 5-minute workout
basic.desc: Let's at least do 5 minutes of exercise today

basic.name: Everyday 20-minute dumbell workout
basic.desc: A simple daily dumbell workout for every day. Start with 1kg and move up to the next size when the workout starts to feel too easy. And of course, we don't forget the legs.

reps.name: 10 squats
reps.desc: hold weights to chest, with a straight back, squat down

reps.name: 10 bicep curls
reps.desc: curl arms up halfway, then stretch arms above head

reps.name: 2x10 squats
reps.desc: Holding the dumbells alternate left and right

reps.name: 10 arm stretches
reps.desc: bend over forwards, curl arms down, stretch arms horizontally

reps.name: 10 folds
reps.desc: Standing up straight while holding dumbells, bend over holding dumbells right above toes, hold for ~ 1-2 seconds. Keep legs straight or bend to your abilities.

reps.name: 20 curls
reps.desc: 10 diagonal whatever. Holding dumbells up to shoulders, starting with one arm, stretch down arm, and pull up 10 repeating times. Switch to other arm and repeat.

c25k.name: Week 1, training 1
c25k.desc: After warming up with a 5 minute brisk walk, do a total of 20 minutes of workout alternating 60s of running and 90s walking.

c25k.name: Week 5, training 3
c25k.desc: After a 5 minute brisk warmup walk, do a total of 20 minutes straight running.
